resources.string: Data Privacy Consent: By providing the requested information below, I consent to the processing of my personal information by Nestlé Philippines, Inc. ("Nestle") to conduct surveys, and evaluate/audit the results of its sampling activity . Further, I acknowledge that a NPI representative may contact me to get my feedback on the Activity conducted, and for additional marketing communications. I likewise understand that all personal information shall be processed in accordance with the Data Privacy Act of 2012 and the Nestle Privacy Notice

By putting my signature below, I certify that I am over 18 years old and I agree to Nestle processing my personal data through its parenTeam website (parenteam.com.ph) in accordance with the Nestle Privacy Policy and Terms of Use (See attachment) I also accept to receive marketing communications by e-mail, telephone/SMS, direct messaging apps and social networking sites about parenTeam and the products of Wyeth Nutrition and Nestlé Nutrition. I understand that I may withdraw my consent at anytime.

By clicking "I consent" below, I certify that I am over 18 years old and I agree to Nestle processing my personal data through its parenTeam website (parenteam.com.ph) in accordance with the Nestle Privacy Policy and Terms of Use (See attachment) I also accept to receive marketing communications by e-mail, telephone/SMS, direct messaging apps and social networking sites about parenTeam and the products of Wyeth Nutrition and Nestlé Nutrition. I understand that I may withdraw my consent at anytime.
